name: One Wheel Wally
description:
Help Wally grow his flower by collecting raindrops, but be careful.  The taller his flower gets, the harder it is to balance!

Created for the GodotWild Game Jam #49

Wildcards: Overgrown and Blast from the Pastel.

Hope you enjoy, couldn't invest as much time as I wanted into this, but I'm still proud.  First ever GameJam and my first ever game made without using a tutorial.
